transcript: I am not a patient person I constantly want things to happen faster I constantly compare my progress to where I think I should be but when I Define patience not as how I felt by simply what you do in the meantime if you say hey be patient that's not helpful for someone because it means nothing like you're being patient while we're on this podcast right now but like you're not really being patient you're just keeping busy you're doing something in the meantime when I defined patience that way it made it operational for me
